article.title: King Aerospace to Provide ISR Aircraft
article.text: King Aerospace Inc., Addison, Texas, was awarded a $32,353,000 modification (P00213) to contract W58RGZ-05-C-0302 for life cycle support for the airborne reconnaissance low DeHaveilland Dash 7 aircraft fleet. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Ala., is the contracting activity.
